FuncDef:
The snmp-agent trap type command is used to configure the way to send trap to NMS.
The default configuration is base-trap.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the way to send trap to NMS to base-trap.
-

Specifies the way to send trap to NMS to entity-trap.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To switch the mode of sending traps to an NMS, run the snmp-agent trap type command.
If the base-trap parameter is specified, detailed alarm information is displayed.If the dc-trap parameter is specified, a small number and a few types of alarms are displayed.If the entity-trap parameter is specified, information about entity alarms is displayed. Types and contents of alarms to be displayed are more abundant.
The base-trap mode is recommended.

Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
